function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited restrictions on personal outings and on-site work during certain periods may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and outbreak of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement stricter and consistent restrictions on personal outings and on-site work, and enforce measures to limit social contact.","Technologies":"Enforcement technologies such as tracking and monitoring systems.","People":"General population, critical workers, and individuals in non-essential industries.","Owner":"Government authorities, public health organizations, and employers."},{"Description":"Inconsistent school closures and reopenings could lead to the spread of contagious diseases among students and staff.","Impact":"Higher risk of transmission within educational settings and potential community spread.","Mitigation":"Standardize school closure policies and implement strict infection control measures within schools.","Technologies":"Remote learning technologies and ventilation systems for indoor air quality improvement.","People":"Students, teachers, school staff, and families.","Owner":"Education authorities and school administrations."},{"Description":"Phased reopening of non-essential stores, bars, and restaurants may contribute to increased social interaction and transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Higher risk of community spread and outbreaks in public gathering spaces.","Mitigation":"Gradual and controlled reopening with strict capacity limits, ventilation improvements, and enforcement of hygiene measures.","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, air purification technologies, and contactless payment systems.","People":"Customers, workers, and business owners in the retail and hospitality sectors.","Owner":"Retail associations, hospitality associations, and local regulatory authorities."}]}
